Furthermore, it ignores the fact that history is not a static thing, but a dynamic and ever-changing tapestry. The world is not the same as it was in ancient Sparta, or in the heyday of the Roman Empire. The circumstances, the cultures, the very fabric of human society has changed beyond recognition.
